save.success: Entity [{{name}}] on system was successfully saved

schemaObjectClasses.title: Schema
schemaObjectClasses.generateSchemaBtnTooltip: Generates and saves schema of the system. The schema is obtained from used connector by actual configuration. If generating will find object or attribut with same name, it will replace it by the actual state on system. Other object and attributes will be kept unchanged.

create.header: New type of object on system

save.success: Object type [{{name}}] on system was successfully saved

generateSchema.message:
Generate and save schema into this system. Schema will be obtain from connector due to actual configuration.
If there will be object or attribute with the same name, it will be replaced (regenerated by state on end system). Other objects and attributes will remain unchanged.

Do you really want to start schema generating / recovery?
generateSchema.success: Generating of schema for system '{{name}}' was successful.

create.success: Configuration  of synchronization [{{name}}] was successfully created

save.success: Configuration of synchronization [{{name}}] was successfully saved

startSynchronization.message: Do you really want to manually start synchronization/reconciliation '{{name}}'?
startSynchronization.started: Synchronization/reconciliation '{{name}}' was started and running now.

cancelSynchronization.message: Do you really want to stop synchronization/reconcilation '{{name}}'?

systemSynchronizationConfigDetail.title: Synchronization details
systemSynchronizationConfigDetail.situationActionsAndWf: In section below is possible to define how the synchronization will react in the given situations. The synchronization behavior is affected by selected workflow. Workflow is started after execution of standar action for each elemnt. Workflow must ensure saving of changes.
systemSynchronizationConfigDetail.customFilterInfo: Custom filter can be defined by selection of attribute (Filter by attribute) by which we want to find relevant operations (Filtering operations). More complicated creteria can be defined in section below.

create.success: Configuration of  synchronization [{{name}}] was successfully created

save.success: Configuration of synchronizataion [{{name}}] was successfully saved

displayName.label: Name
displayName.placeholder: Finds logs, which contains value in name.

save.success: Account on system was successfully created

button.checkSystemTooltip: Performs save actual settings and call test on connector.

save.success: Connector configuration for system [{{name}}] was successfully saved.

changeConnector.message:
Immediate change of connector for system. Original connector will no longer be active. This may cause malfunctions of the system.

Do you really want to change connector and save the system?

save.success: Object type [{{name}}] on system was successfully saved

mappings.header: Attributes mapping<small> attribute groups for operation and entity type</small>
mappings.title: Mapping

edit.header: Mapping details of entities and operations

create.success: Mapping for type of entity [{{name}}] was successfully created
create.header: New mapping for entity and operation

save.success: Mapping for entity type [{{name}}] was succesfully saved

mappingDetail.title: Mapping of attributes
mappingDetail.header: Mapping of attributes <small>for IdM entity and operation type</small>

edit.header: Detail of IdM entity type and operation

create.header: New type of IdM entity and operation
create.success: IdM entity type [{{entityType}}] for operation [{{operationType}}] was succesfully created

save.success: IdM entity type [{{entityType}}] for operation [{{operationType}}] was succesfully saved

attributeDetail.title: Attribute in schema
attributeDetail.returnedByDefaultTooltip: Attribute is contained in result of account serch. This is not applied for example on password attribute, which is not returned in result by default

attributeMappingDetail.title: Attribute in IdM
attributeMappingDetail.alertNoRepository: The attribute is not mapped to any entity in CzechIdM or extended attribute. Output will be constant from 'Transformation to system'
attributeMappingDetail.infoPasswordMapping: If attribute __PASSWORD__ is equal to value NULL, it will be automatically generated from the password policy for the system.

save.success: Attribute [{{name}}] of IdM was successfully saved
System [{{system}}] for role {{role}} was successfully saved

create.success: Connection of system was successfully created

save.success: Connection of system was successfully edited

create.success: Attribute [{{name}}] for role was successfully created

save.success: Attribute [{{name}}] for role was successfully edited
Account on system was successfully saved

retry.message: Retry only selected operation {{name}}. Only selected operation will be executed regardless of other records in queue. The sequence of operations may not be maintained.
retry.message_plural: Retry only {{count}} selected operations. Only selected operation will be executed regardless of other records in queue. The sequence of operations may not be maintained.
retry.batchMessage: Retry all operations for selected entity {{name}} in the queue. All operations for selected entity will be executed to system. Sequence is sorted by time of incoming to queue, so final state of entity on system will be retained
retry.batchMessage_plural: Retry all operations for selected entity by {{count}} selected operations in queue. All operations for selected entities will be executed to system. Sequence is sorted by time of incoming to queue, so final state of entities on system will be retained
retry.success: Retrying operations of provisinong were started.

cancel.message: Or do you want to cancel just selected operation {{name}}?
cancel.message_plural: Or do you want to cancel just {{count}} selected operations?
cancel.batchMessage: Do you want to cancel all operations for entity {{name}} in the queue?
cancel.batchMessage_plural: Do you want to cancel all operations for entity {{count}} in the queuee.?

readonly.label: Read-only
readonly.help: Active provisioning operations create, update and delete, will not be executed.

queue.label: Supports queue
queue.help: Active provisioning operations create, update and delete, will run through the queue.

remoteConnector.label: Use remote connector server
remoteConnector.help: After check, local connectors will not be used.

idmPropertyName.label: IdM key
idmPropertyName.help: Name of entity attr., name of extended attr., or key to confidential storage.

transformToResourceScriptSelectBox.label: Available scripts for transformation from resource
transformToResourceScriptSelectBox.help: After script selection, will be automatically insert code which calls selected script including sample paramteres.

transformFromResourceScriptSelectBox.label: Available scripts to transformation to resource
transformFromResourceScriptSelectBox.help: After script selection, will be automatically insert code which calls selected script including sample paramteres.

transformFromResourceScript.label: Transformation from system
transformFromResourceScript.help: Allows to transform the value from system into a form suitable for CzechIdM. Input parameters of this Groovy script are value of the attribute 'attributeValue' and list 'icAttributes' of object attributes on the system.

authenticationAttribute.label: Authentication attr.
authenticationAttribute.help: Attribute used for authentication on connected system.

transformToResourceScript.label: Transformation to system
transformToResourceScript.help: Allows to transform the value from CzechIdM into a from suitable for connected system. Input parameters of this Groovy script are value of attribute 'attributeValue', IdM entity 'entity' and account identificator 'uid'. If output value is empty, system automaticly use available account identificator (uid).

uid.label: Identificator
uid.tooltip: Attribute is unique identificator of object.

sendOnlyIfNotNull.label: Send IdM value only if its not null
sendOnlyIfNotNull.tooltip: Value for this attribute (computed by CzechIdM), will be sent on target system only if value is not null.

sendAlways.label: Send always
sendAlways.tooltip: Value for this attribute will be always send on target system. Even if is not changed.

disabledAttribute.label: Disabled
disabledAttribute.tooltip: Disabled attribute will not be used in provisioning in default state. It can still be overload and activated in roles.

name.label: Name
name.help: User-defined name of this system attribute, overloaded by the role.

RoleSystemAttribute.disabledDefaultAttributeTooltip: If checked, attribute will never be send to system. Even if the attribute has default mapping.

transformScript.label: Transformation to system
transformScript.help: Allows to transform value from CzechIdM to state intended for connected system. Input parameters of this Groovy script are attribute value 'attributeValue', IdM entity 'entity' and account identificator 'uid'. If script output value is null, than returning value is available account identificator (uid).

customFilter.label: User custom filter
customFilter.help: With this choice synchronization will be managed by filter defined below. Without this choice, synchronization is managed by connector mechanisms.

filterAttribute.label: Filter by attribute
filterAttribute.help: This attribute (with type of filter operation) will be used was default filter criterium for synchronization. Other criteria can be define in filter script.

customFilterScript.label: Custom filter
customFilterScript.help: This Groovy script sets own search filter for accoutns on system which will be synchronized.

rootsFilterScript.label: Definition of tree roots
rootsFilterScript.help: This Groovy script sets definition of tree root. Script input is 'account' (IcObject). Output must be Boolean ('true' for root). Without script implementation, every element without parent is consider as root.

reconciliation.label: Reconciliation
reconciliation.help: This choice will execute full reconciliation insted of synchronization. So synchronization will be executed for all accounts without filter. Searching for missing accounts will be executed for all entites in CzechIdM.

AttributeMappingStrategyTypeEnum.WRITE_IF_NULL: Write only if target value is null

CONNECTOR_CONFIGURATION_FOR_SYSTEM_NOT_F.title: Connector was not selected
CONNECTOR_CONFIGURATION_FOR_SYSTEM_NOT_F.message: Connector for system [{{system}}] is not defined. Please, select connector definiton in system settings.

PROVISIONING_ATTRIBUTE_MORE_UID.title: Unique identificator already exists
PROVISIONING_ATTRIBUTE_MORE_UID.message: System {{system}} has already set unique identificator.

PROVISIONING_ROLE_ATTRIBUTE_MORE_UID.title: Unique identificator already exists
PROVISIONING_ROLE_ATTRIBUTE_MORE_UID.message: Role {{role}} and system {{system}} have already set unique identificator.

PROVISIONING_SYSTEM_DISABLED.title: Provisioning of account [{{name}}] wasn't executed
PROVISIONING_SYSTEM_DISABLED.message: Provisioning of account [{{name}}] on system [{{system}}] wasn't executed. System is configured as inactive.

PROVISIONING_SYSTEM_READONLY.title: Provisioning of account [{{name}}] wasn't executed
PROVISIONING_SYSTEM_READONLY.message: Provisioning of account [{{name}}] on system [{{system}}] wasn't executed. System is in read-only mode.

PROVISIONING_PREPARE_ACCOUNT_ATTRIBUTES_.title: Provisioning of account [{{name}}] wasn't executed
PROVISIONING_PREPARE_ACCOUNT_ATTRIBUTES_.message: Provisioning of account [{{name}}] on system [{{system}}] failed.

PROVISIONING_FAILED.title: Provisioning of account [{{name}}] wasn't executed
PROVISIONING_FAILED.message: Provisioning of account [{{name}}] on system [{{system}}] failed.

PROVISIONING_SUCCEED.title: Provisioning of accout [{{name}}] was executed
PROVISIONING_SUCCEED.message: Provisioning of account [{{name}}] on system [{{system}}] successfully finished.

PROVISIONING_IS_IN_QUEUE.title: Provisioning task for account [{{name}}] was stored to queue
PROVISIONING_IS_IN_QUEUE.message: Account has some unfinished provisioning tasks in queue. New provisioning task for account [{{name}}] on system [{{system}}] was stored to queue.

PROVISIONING_IDM_FIELD_NOT_FOUND.title: Item for provisioning was not found
PROVISIONING_IDM_FIELD_NOT_FOUND.message: IdM item [{{field}}] for entity [{{entity}}] was not found!

PROVISIONING_PASSWORD_FIELD_NOT_FOUND.title: Password mapping attribute was not found
PROVISIONING_PASSWORD_FIELD_NOT_FOUND.message: Mapping attribute for password (___PASSWORD__) for entity [{{entity}}] was not found!

PROVISIONING_RESOURCE_ATTRIBUTE_NOT_FOUN.title: Provisioning - attribute was not found on connected system
PROVISIONING_RESOURCE_ATTRIBUTE_NOT_FOUN.message: Attribute [{{attribute}}] for entity [{{entity}}] was not found on connected system!

PROVISIONING_PASSWORD_WRONG_TYPE.title: Provisioning - password attribute type must be GuardedString
PROVISIONING_PASSWORD_WRONG_TYPE.message: password attribute type must be GuardedString!

PROVISIONING_ATTRIBUTE_VALUE_WRONG_TYPE.title: Provisioning - attribute value is not in correct type
PROVISIONING_ATTRIBUTE_VALUE_WRONG_TYPE.message: Scheman of attribute [{{attribute}}] defines type of [{{schemaAttributeType}}]. But value type is [{{valueType}}]!

PROVISIONING_ATTRIBUTE_TYPE_NOT_FOUND.title: Provisioning - attribute value was not found
PROVISIONING_ATTRIBUTE_TYPE_NOT_FOUND.message: Attribute schema [{{attribute}}] defines type [{{schemaAttributeType}}]. This type cannot be retrieved!

PROVISIONING_ATTRIBUTE_UID_IS_NOT_STRING.title: Provisioning - UID value is not String
PROVISIONING_ATTRIBUTE_UID_IS_NOT_STRING.message: Value of UID attribute must be type of String, but given type is [{{uid}}]!

PROVISIONING_ATTRIBUTE_UID_NOT_FOUND.title: Provisioning - UID attribute was not found
PROVISIONING_ATTRIBUTE_UID_NOT_FOUND.message: UID attribute was not found on system [{{system}}]. UID attribute is necessary for provisioning!

PROVISIONING_DUPLICATE_ROLE_MAPPING.title: Provisioning - More attribute definitions for the same UID and role
PROVISIONING_DUPLICATE_ROLE_MAPPING.message: There was found more definitions of attributes for the same UID and same role [{{role}}], on system [{{system}}] and entity type [{{entityType}}]!

PROVISIONING_DIFFERENT_UIDS_FROM_CONNECT.title: Provisioning - UID attribute was not found
PROVISIONING_DIFFERENT_UIDS_FROM_CONNECT.message: Connector returned more different UIDs, for different object classes!

PROVISIONING_MERGE_ATTRIBUTE_IS_NOT_MULT.title: Provisioning - MERGE is not multivalued
PROVISIONING_MERGE_ATTRIBUTE_IS_NOT_MULT.message: Object [{{object}}]. For MERGE strategy must be attribute [{{attribute}}] multivalued!

PROVISIONING_ATTRIBUTE_STRATEGY_CONFLICT.title: Provisioning - Attribute strategy conflict
PROVISIONING_ATTRIBUTE_STRATEGY_CONFLICT.message: Strategies [{{strategyParent}}] and [{{strategyConflict}}] are confilcted for attribute [{{attribute}}]!

SYNCHRONIZATION_SYSTEM_IS_NOT_ENABLED.title: System is disabled
SYNCHRONIZATION_SYSTEM_IS_NOT_ENABLED.message: Synchronization [{{name}}] cannot be started, becouse system [{{system}}] is disabled!

CONFIDENTIAL_VALUE_IS_NOT_GUARDED_STRING.title: Confidential attribute is not GuardedString
CONFIDENTIAL_VALUE_IS_NOT_GUARDED_STRING.message: Confidential attribute [{{property}}] is not type of GuardedString, but it's [{{class}}]!

SYNCHRONIZATION_CORRELATION_TO_MANY_RESU.title: Synchronization - too many entities was found for correlation attribute
SYNCHRONIZATION_CORRELATION_TO_MANY_RESU.message: Too many entities was found for correlation attribite [{{correlationAttribute}}] for value [{{value}}]!

SYNCHRONIZATION_TOKEN_ATTRIBUTE_NOT_FOUN.title: Synchronization - for synchronization by custom attribute is compulsory attribute Token!
SYNCHRONIZATION_TOKEN_ATTRIBUTE_NOT_FOUN.message: for synchronization by custom attribute is compulsory attribute Token!

SYNCHRONIZATION_TO_MANY_SYSTEM_ENTITY.title: Synchronization - more than one record of 'System entity' was found
SYNCHRONIZATION_TO_MANY_SYSTEM_ENTITY.message: More than one record of 'System entity was found for UID [{{uid}}]!

SYNCHRONIZATION_FILTER_VALUE_WRONG_TYPE.title: Synchronization - filter for synchronization must be type of 'IcFilter'
SYNCHRONIZATION_FILTER_VALUE_WRONG_TYPE.message: Filter for synchronization must be type of 'IcFilter', but the value type is [{{type}}]!

SYNCHRONIZATION_ERROR_DURING_SYNC_ITEM.title: Synchronization - error during synchronization
SYNCHRONIZATION_ERROR_DURING_SYNC_ITEM.message: Durring synchronization of UID [{{uid}}], unexpected error has occurred!

SYNCHRONIZATION_TO_MANY_ACC_ACCOUNT.title: Synchronization - more than one records of 'AccAccount' were found
SYNCHRONIZATION_TO_MANY_ACC_ACCOUNT.message: Found more that one records of 'AccAccount' for the same UID [{{uid}}]!

SYSTEM_MAPPING_DELETE_FAILED_USED_IN_SYN.title: System mapping [{{mapping}}] cannot be removed
SYSTEM_MAPPING_DELETE_FAILED_USED_IN_SYN.message: System mapping [{{mapping}}] cannot be removed. It's used for synchronization of the same system!

ATTRIBUTE_MAPPING_DELETE_FAILED_USED_IN_.title: Attribute [{{attribute}}] cannot be removed
ATTRIBUTE_MAPPING_DELETE_FAILED_USED_IN_.message: Atribut [{{attribute}}] cannot be removed. It's used for synchronization of the same system!

SYSTEM_DELETE_FAILED_HAS_ENTITIES.title: System cannot be removed
SYSTEM_DELETE_FAILED_HAS_ENTITIES.message: System [{{system}}] cannot be removed. There are managed entities on the system..

SYSTEM_DELETE_FAILED_HAS_ACCOUNTS.title: System cannot be removed
SYSTEM_DELETE_FAILED_HAS_ACCOUNTS.message: System [{{system}}] cannot be removed. There are managed accounts on the system.

SYSTEM_ENTITY_DELETE_FAILED_HAS_OPERATIO.title: Entity on system cannot be removed
SYSTEM_ENTITY_DELETE_FAILED_HAS_OPERATIO.message: Entity [{{uid}}] on system [{{system}}] cannot be removed. Active provisioning operations exist for the entity.

REMOTE_SERVER_INVALID_CREDENTIAL.message: Bad password for remote connector server [{{server}}]

REMOTE_SERVER_CANT_CONNECT.message: Can't connecto to remote connector server [{{server}}]

REMOTE_SERVER_UNEXPECTED_ERROR.title: Unexpected error
REMOTE_SERVER_UNEXPECTED_ERROR.message: Unexpected error while connect to server [{{server}}]

CONNECTOR_FORM_DEFINITION_NOT_FOUND.message: Form definition for system not found, please choose connector first.
